name: Duck Galaxy
description:
Duck Galaxy was created in 72 hours for Mini Jam 99: Birds.

A rogue blackhole has consumed all matter in the galaxy except duck.

Survive

Breed

Consume

Collect green eggs to hatch four ducks. Red eggs hatch self-replicating ducks. Reach a flock size of 100 to power up.

AWSD or arrow keys for movement. Left Shift for boost.
